sentences.en: A cloud is a condensation of water vapour in the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 云是由大气中的水蒸气凝结成的.

sentences.en: A condensation to quinoid systems occurs.
sentences.cn: 发生了醌型体系的缩合反应.

sentences.en: A reduction in condensation is accomplished by the use of steam - jackets.
sentences.cn: 使用汽套就能达到降低冷凝.

sentences.en: Condensation will eventually cause the fabric of the building to rot away.
sentences.cn: 冷凝作用将最终使建筑结构腐朽掉。

sentences.en: For this reason such reactions are frequently termed condensation polymerizations.
sentences.cn: 根据这个理由,常常把这种反应定义为缩合聚合.

sentences.en: He used his sleeve to wipe the condensation off the glass.
sentences.cn: 他用袖子擦掉玻璃上凝结的水珠。

sentences.en: Steam clouded the mirror, ie covered it with condensation.
sentences.cn: 蒸气把镜子弄得糊不清.

sentences.en: That which shows the " normal " condensation pattern is called euchromatin.
sentences.cn: 那些表现 “ 正常的 ” 浓缩格式的部分叫做常染色质.

sentences.en: The combined addition - elimination sequence is referred to as a condensation reaction.
sentences.cn: 将联合加成 - 消除反应的结果称为缩合反应.

sentences.en: The moisture condensation can be identified by the visual evidence.
sentences.cn: 湿汽的凝聚能够靠视觉辩别.

sentences.en: The particles can be detected with a condensation nucleus counter.
sentences.cn: 这种粒子可以用凝结核计数器探测到.

sentences.en: The polysaccharides are all condensation products of hexoses or other monosaccharides.
sentences.cn: 多糖全部是己糖或其它单糖的浓缩产物.

sentences.en: The report is a brilliant condensation of several years'work.
sentences.cn: 这报告是几年工作的精华.

sentences.en: The window panes were running with condensation.
sentences.cn: 凝结的水珠在窗玻璃上流动。

sentences.en: There was a lot of condensation on the windows.
There was condensation on the windows.

words.tran_cn: 冷凝器；[电] 电容器；[光] 聚光器

phrases.tran_cn: 凝聚物；缩合产物；浓缩体

trans.tran_cn: 凝结的水珠，（气体）冷凝，简缩（书）
trans.tran_en: when a gas becomes a liquid
